name: Salsa
keywords: jalapeño, tomatillo, tomato, vegan, vegetarian, winter
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons lime juice, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a kettle half full of water and bring to a boil. Add the tomatoes, tomatillos and jalapenos and boil 10 minutes. Drain the vegetables, reserving 1 cup of the cooking water. Peel the skin off the tomatoes and trim jalapeno stems.

Transfer the tomatoes, tomatillos and jalapenos to a blender or food processor and add the onion and garlic. Pulse until the vegetables are coarsely chopped. Pulse in 1/4 cup cilantro. Add some of the reserved water if the mixture is too thick.
Transfer the salsa to a bowl and stir in the remaining cilantro, scallions, sugar and lime juice and season to taste with salt.
